REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires equal distribution of legislative staff and resources
Summary: Requires an equal distribution of legislative staff and appropriations to be made among all members of the legislature; provides for additional funds and staff for members in special capacities as long as such additional staff does not deal with constituent services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring an equal apportionment of resources and staff for members of the legislature
